resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107515</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107515</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087104</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">"This is for traitors."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"dieses ist für Traitors."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"c'est pour des traîtres."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"isto é para traitors."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"questo è per i traitors."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Αυτό είναι για τους προδότες."</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">"esto está para los traidores."</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">During World War I, laws restricting freedom of speech and the arrest and prosecution of those who opposed the war created an atmosphere of repression, hysteria, and vigilantism. While President Woodrow Wilson called for 100 percent Americanism</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Während des Ersten Weltkrieges, der Gesetze erstellte das
Einschränken von von Freiheit der Rede und des Anhaltens und der 
Verfolgung von denen, die dem Krieg entgegensetzten, eine Atmosphäre 
der Unterdrückung, der Hysterie und des vigilantism. 
Während Präsident Woodrow Wilson einen 100 Prozent 
Amerikanismus verlangte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pendant la Première Guerre Mondiale, les lois la 
restriction de la liberté de la parole et de l'arrestation et la 
poursuite de ceux qui se sont opposés à la guerre a créé une 
atmosphère de répression, d'hystérie, et de vigilantism. 
Tandis que le Président Woodrow Wilson nécessitait 
l'Américanisme de 100 pour cent</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Durante o world.war.i, as leis restringir a liberdade do 
discurso e da apreensão e o prosecution daquelas que opuseram a 
guerra criou uma atmosfera do repression, do hysteria, e do 
vigilantism. Quando o presidente Woodrow Wilson se chamou para 
um americanism de 100 por cento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Durante il world.war.i, le leggi limitare la libertà di 
discorso e dell'arresto ed il processo di coloro che ha opposto la 
guerra ha creato un atmosfera di repressione, di hysteria e del 
vigilantism. Mentre il presidente Woodrow Wilson ha richiesto un
americanism di 100 per cento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατά τη διάρκεια του παγκόσμιου πολέμου Ι, οι νόμοι 
που περιορίζουν την ελευθερία της ομιλίας και της σύλληψης και τη 
συνέχιση εκείνοι που αντέταξαν τον πόλεμο δημιούργησαν μια 
ατμόσφαιρα της καταστολής, της υστερίας, και του vigilantism. 
Ενώ ο Πρόεδρος Woodrow Wilson απαίτησε 100 τοις 
εκατό Americanism</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Durante Primera Guerra Mundial, leyes la restricción de 
la libertad del discurso y de la detención y el procesamiento de los 
que opusieron la guerra creó una atmósfera de la represión, de la 
histeria, y del vigilantism. Mientras que presidente Woodrow 
Wilson llamó para el americanism de 100 por ciento</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CENTER FOR HISTORY AND NEW MEDIA/AMERICAN SOCIAL HISTORY PROJECT
FN:CENTER FOR HISTORY AND NEW MEDIA/AMERICAN SOCIAL HISTORY PROJECT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087104</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">No License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107515</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>

  </manifestation>
